meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a cur
meanings.sent1: The dog's currish behavior scared away the neighbors.
meanings.sent2: Her currish attitude made it difficult to work with her.
meanings.sent3: Despite his currish appearance, the dog was actually quite friendly.
meanings.sent4: The man's currish nature was like a dark cloud hanging over the office.
meanings.sent5: The currish growls of the stray dog echoed through the alley.

meanings.sent1: His currish remarks hurt her feelings deeply.
meanings.sent2: The currish cat hissed at anyone who came near.
meanings.sent3: Even on his birthday, he couldn't shake off his currish mood.
meanings.sent4: The teacher's currish glare silenced the noisy classroom.
meanings.sent5: The currish old man yelled at the kids to get off his lawn.
